name: align-assignments
title: Align Assignments
description: Align the equal signs of assignments across multiple lines (press Ctrl-Shift-A)

name: appcache-buddy
title: App Cache Buddy
description: Generate & validate application cache manifests

name: code-aging
title: Code Aging
description: Visualizes the age of code lines by changing the background color

name: commands-guide
title: Commands Guide
description: Similar to Quicksilver on the Mac, Sublime's Command Palette or Eclipse's Quick Access (press Cmd/Ctrl+Alt+?)

name: color-picker
title: Color Picker
description: Edit hex colors with an inline color picker

name: csslint
title: CSSLint
description: Provides CSSLint support for your documents

name: debugger
title: Debugger
description: Adds debugging capabilities to Brackets

name: editor-navigation-shortcuts
title: Editor Navigation Shortcuts
description: Adds Eclipse-style keyboard navigation to switch between open files (press Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+E, also Cmd/Ctrl+[ or ])

name: everyscrub
title: Everyscrub
description: Cmd/Ctrl + drag horizontally on any number or hex color to scrub its value

name: github
title: GitHub
description: Adding the GitHub API to Brackets

name: inline-color-editor
title: Inline Color Editor
description: An HTML/CSS/JS based inline color editor

name: annotate
title: JSDoc Annotate
description: Generate JSDoc annotations for your functions

name: jshint
title: JSHint
description: Provides JSHint support for your documents

name: markdown
title: Markdown
description: Display comment blocks with rendered markdown

name: MDNLookup-extension
title: MDN Lookup
description: Look up HTML tags on MDN

name: v8-node-live
title: Node.js/V8 Live Editing
description: Update scripts running in a V8 virtual machine as you type

name: open-file-from-url
title: Open File from URL
description: Open href and rel URLs to files (press Alt+O on any href or rel attribute)

name: phonegapbuild
title: PhoneGap Build
description: Get web projects from Brackets into a mobile application

name: prefixr
title: Prefixr
description: Replace the current CSS text selection with the prefixed result returned by Prefixr

name: recent-projects
title: Recent Projects
description: Shows a dropdown for recent projects

name: RelatedFiles
title: Related Files
description: Discover and open related files in your project

name: ReloadInBrowser
title: Reload in Browser
description: Reload the page in the browser (press Cmd/Ctrl-Shift-R)

name: ShowIndentations
title: Show Indentations
description: Visualizes indentations like Sublime Text does (click View > Show Indentations)

name: snippets
title: Snippets
description:
Expands snippets, i.e. d â‡’
(press Ctrl-Shift-S to see available snippets, Ctrl-Alt-S to insert a snippet)

name: StringConvert
title: StringConvert
description: Provides string conversions like "To Upper Case", "HTML Entity Encode", "Toggle Quotes" and more (select text, click Edit > To Upper Case)

name: tabtospace
title: Tab to Space
description: Converts tabs to spaces and vice versa (click File > Convert tabs to spaces)

name: togist
title: ToGist
description: Creates a Github Gist from the current text selection (select text, click Edit > Create Gist)

name: w3cvalidation
title: W3C Validation
description: Validates the current file when saving with the W3C validator (click View > Enable W3CValidation)
